title: A Trip down memory lane
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Film festivals - Canada - Vancouver - Awards
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Film festivals - Italy - Venice - Awards
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Film festivals - United States - San Francisco - Awards
description: Arthur Lipsett's incisive look at human might, majesty and mayhem, compiled from some peculiar newsreel items of the twentieth century. The filmmaker calls this 'additional material for a time capsule', but his arrangement of pictures combined with Ron Alexander's soundtrack makes it almost explosive. There are hundreds of items, once front-page news, but all wryly grotesque when seen in this reshuffle of the past. (Awards: San Francisco, Venice)
